thread.title: WATCH: Chelsea Loanee Bertrand Traore Scores A Brilliant Solo Goal
thread.title_full: WATCH: Chelsea Loanee Bertrand Traore Scores A Brilliant Solo Goal

title: WATCH: Chelsea Loanee Bertrand Traore Scores A Brilliant Solo Goal
text:
WATCH: Chelsea Loanee Bertrand Traore Scores A Brilliant Solo Goal Sun Feb 12 2017 21:59:05   21:59:05   
The likes of Diego Costa and Eden Hazard might be sweeping all before them in the Premier League with Chelsea , but hopefully somebody is keeping an eye on Bertrand Traore on loan at Ajax. 
The 21-year-old is with the Dutch giants for the season, but despite voicing his displeasure at being sent on loan at the first place last summer, he's certainly making the most of his time in Holland. 
Traore has scored six goals for the Amsterdam side since arriving, with his latest coming this afternoon against Sparta. 
He'd been out of the Ajax team for a month or so after helping Burkina Faso reach the last four of the African Cup of Nations in Gabon and he looked keen to make up for lost time: 
He might have been sent out to another club this season, but Traore actually scored four goals for Chelsea last season, and judging by this form, he could definitely still have a future at the London club. 
Traore will hope not to get himself on our list of Football Manager superstars who flopped: 
What do you think of the goal? 
Chelsea have had an incredible 38 players on loan and away from Stamford Bridge this season:
